snippet: Major League Baseball has agreed to a five-year deal with StubHub as its secondary ticket market, though inancial terms were not disclosed.
abstract: Major League Baseball agrees to a five-year deal with StubHub as its secondary ticket market.
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball has agreed to a five-year deal with StubHub as its secondary ticket market, though inancial terms were not disclosed.

headline.seo: New Deal for Major League Baseball and StubHub
